title: Test NERC CIP Compliance
description: For an electric utility, a compliance auditor tests adherence to NERC CIP (Critical Infrastructure Protection) standards.

tasks.description: Review the training records for all personnel with access to the critical cyber systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor verifies that all required personnel have completed their annual security awareness training.

tasks.description: Review the logs for all remote access to the critical systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor verifies that all remote access sessions used multi-factor authentication.

tasks.description: Perform a physical inspection of the data center to ensure all access points are secured and access is logged.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds that the visitor access log for the data center is not being consistently filled out.
